testcase.system-out: Given the user is on homepage...............................................passed And clicks on "PIM" in sidepanel............................................passed Then PIM page is displayed..................................................passed When Admin clicks on Add button.............................................passed Then "Add Employee" page is displayed.......................................passed And Add profile picture.....................................................passed And Fills all the parameters Suraj,s and naik...............................passed And Click on save button....................................................passed Then "Personal Details" page gets displayed.................................passed And Click on "Job"..........................................................passed And Job details page is displayed...........................................passed Then Fill the parameters for Account Assistant, Engineering and Full-Time Permanent.passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed And Click on the "Report-to"................................................passed Then The "Report to" page is displayed......................................passed And Click on add button.....................................................passed And Add Odis Adalwin and Direct............................................passed When Clicks on the save button..............................................passed And Click on Employee list..................................................passed And Check if the employee with Suraj,s,naikand Account Assistant is added...failed
